label: MDHHealthIndication
comment: Information related to a specific transportation indication to be reported on a WHO MDH (Maritime Declaration of Health).

objectProperties.comment: A sanitary measure applied for this MDH health indication.
A textual description of this MDH health indication.
An identifier of a location for this MDH health indication.
A location name, expressed as text, of a location for this MDH health indication.
A reported date, time, date time or other date time value for this MDH health indication.
A reported quantity for this MDH health indication.
The indication of whether or not the status of this MDH health indication is true or false.
A code specifying a type of MDH health indication.

referencedBy.comment: A died onboard indication for this MDH transportation health.
A disease onboard indication for this MDH transportation health.
An ill person or persons now onboard indication for this MDH transportation health.
A medical practitioner consulted indication for this MDH transportation health.
A more ill onboard indication for this MDH transportation health.
An onboard infection condition indication for this MDH transportation health.
An applied sanitary measure indication for this MDH transportation health.
A sick animal or animals onboard indication for this MDH transportation health.
A stowaway or stowaways found onboard indication for this MDH transportation health.
